comment: We watched multiple films and participated in discussion/ analysis projects throughout. I enjoyed the films and found everything interesting. There are a lot of concepts that he talks about and are not brought up again later in the course. A very complicated textbook that can be overwhelming to read, but the coursework itself is not too difficult.

Trivedi makes his class much harder than it needs to be. He goes into way too much depth with random concepts I'm not even sure relate to the course. This made the class very confusing and he is terrible at providing clear feedback. The work required is lengthy and overall a waste of time. I made it out but I'm begging you to save yourself! Avoid!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: While Professor Trivedi is passionate about the topics, he was terrible at explaining assignment instructions and due dates. He also waited until the last few days of the semester to grade 3/4 of the assignments and gave us all bad grades until we complained as a collective and he was spoken to by his supervisor.

This professor gives no feedback on assignments throughout the semester, and will only start grading assignments in the days leading up to the end of the semester. Prepare to email him as to why he is failing you and to be met with a copy-and-paste response.

This class is unnecessarily hard for no reason. There is no reason it should be as much work as he makes it. Uses discord which is already hard to navigate. I had to withdraw bc I was spending more time on this class than all of my other classes COMBINED, and I'm taking BLAW2200, ACCT2102, and ECON2300. Dont even waste your time.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: Doesn't grade work for weeks at a time. Takes days to respond to students if at all. Has a rubric for papers yet the professor doesn't stick to it. I.E say a paper has sources and a bibliography for said sources. If he doesn't like them you'll get no credit for having them at all.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things--Tough grader

comment: His class is very annoying because he doesnt go into detail about anything and he constantly grades late. Were halfway through the semester and he still isnt up to date with grades.

This class was the most confusing and hard class Ive had. The professor is not specific on his grading and just gives you a bad grade with not much feedback for you to improve. I hated every second of this class.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Tough grader

comment: This man is extremely late in giving responses. To be fair, this should have been an easy course, but he makes it tedious than it has to be. He uses lecture videos from previous semesters, has a TA but our work stays ungraded for weeks. I work hours for a paper and all I get in response is a cross mark without any comments. AVOID! Save your GPA!

Slow grader, but kind and approachable. Answered questions slowly as well. If you have an issue, and need grace, all you have to do is reach out, and he will absolutely consider your situation. Just make sure you do it with time to spare.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--So many papers

comment: I had trouble in the beginning with the software he wanted us to use and fell a little behind because of it. Professor Trivedi helped me out and will definitely be a teacher I will remember. He taught the importance of setting goals and all-around has got me in a better situation than when I first started. 10/10 would recommend him for PERS
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Do not recommend taking this class. My class was 100% online. In the beginning he was great with grading and staying on top of things. As the semester progressed, he slowly stopped grading assignments on time. He never gave any feedback on papers and projects. He would enter a ton of grades at once so my grade dropped and raised when he did that.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Tough grader

comment: We read a lot of case studies and actually wrote a few ourselves. Bottom line is, MAKE SURE YOU DO YOUR ASSIGNMENTS. I cannot stress this enough. Dr. T is an honest, easy to work with person. Just do your best and you'll pass.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--So many papers

comment: Dr. Trivedi actively pushes students to be above average when it comes to class responses, and loves it when students discuss material in an in-depth way. He tries his best to extend a helping hand to students who need it. Side note: He teaches through an app called Discord, and if you aren't experienced with it, I suggest learning how to use it.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: The class itself is a simple straight forward class, however this man makes it much more complicated than it needs to be. Instead of just using D2L for discussions, you use a weird website that is used for gaming. He assigns so much reading on top of projects he gives no information about. He doesn't update grades at all, DO NOT take this prof.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: Best teacher I have had so far at Kennesaw State. A teacher that every freshman needs to have. Cares for his students and has respect for each one. Class is not difficult just show up and take notes and study for quizzes because they are short.
Amazing professor who inspired me to do my best. I was nervous but he made me really want to learn.

this class definitely shouldnt have been THIS hard and THIS work heavy for an intro to college class. He was so unorganized and so unstructured, I dreaded his class more than anything. And 80% of it was busy work.
rating_tags: Test heavy--Group projects--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Dr. Trivedi is the prime example of what type of professors freshmen need! I gained a medical issue while taking this course that kept me from being able to attend class, and attendance is a MUST! But he was very understanding and really works with you if you show you want it. DON'T SKIP OUT ON HOMEWORK READINGS THO!!! YOU WON'T PASS THE QUIZZES!!
